description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Bubbles was quite the loveable pet fish, offering his owners endless hours of entertainment. Unfortunately, even good fish don't last forever, and like so many of his scaly brethren he was found floating at the top of his bowl, fins up. Having been unceremoniously flushed down the john, he now finds himself lost in the swirling vortex of the great beyond.  (20 levels with “save anywhere” support)
